Name: Avoid - Sensory Overload
About the game: Avoid is a fast-paced arcade game that will test your reflexes. Drive your vehicle through an obstacle-filled course and try to go as far as you can. Grab bonus items to help you survive... just a little bit more. Climb up the online leaderboard and show the world who's best! Are your fingers fast enough? Features: Fast arcade game, easy to learn but difficult to master Challenging levels and a randomly generated endless mode Engaging visual effects and soundrack Online leaderboards Have we already mentioned that it's FAST?
